attributes.action: For Brexit Success: Abolish Business Rates and Make Up The Difference in VAT.
attributes.additional_details:
[1]http://moneyweek.com/its-time-to-abolish-business-rates/
[2]https://www.retail-week.com/topics/policy-and-legal/uk-has-the-highest-business-rates-bill-across-eu-says-report/5049347.article
[3]http://www.telegraph.co.uk/finance/11912104/George-Osborne-unveils-radical-business-rates-overhaul.html
[4]http://www.telegraph.co.uk/finance/newsbysector/retailandconsumer/11815278/Business-tsar-backs-plea-for-business-rates-cut.html
For a small change in VAT the burden is removed from British Business.
attributes.background: UK Businesses are grossly overcharged in business rates without bearing on the revenue they generate. Almost 4% of UK GDP is from these rates, verses 0.65% in the rest of Europe. UK businesses have to charge more to compensate, making them less competitive. Move to VAT would level the playing field.
